alert.note: Alert for Nassau; Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:06PM EDT until July 29 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR WESTERN SUFFOLK AND NORTHEASTERN NASSAU COUNTIES... At 805 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Westport to Garden City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Commack, Huntington Station, Centereach, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Plainview, Medford, Massapequa, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Huntington, Stony Brook, and Babylon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
